mapper.select: select id, section_code, section_name, section_alphbet, order_num, contact, contact_mobile, check_type, del_flag, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, delete_id, delete_time, department_id from t_section_office where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_section_office(section_code, section_name, section_alphbet, order_num, contact, contact_mobile, check_type, del_flag, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, delete_id, delete_time, department_id) values (#{sectionCode}, #{sectionName}, #{sectionAlphbet}, #{orderNum}, #{contact}, #{contactMobile}, #{checkType}, #{delFlag}, #{createId}, #{createTime}, #{updateId}, #{updateTime}, #{deleteId}, #{deleteTime}, #{departmentId})

insert into t_section_office(section_code, section_name, section_alphbet, order_num, contact, contact_mobile, check_type, del_flag, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, delete_id, delete_time, department_id) values
(#{entity.sectionCode}, #{entity.sectionName}, #{entity.sectionAlphbet}, #{entity.orderNum}, #{entity.contact}, #{entity.contactMobile}, #{entity.checkType}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.createId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateId}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.deleteId}, #{entity.deleteTime}, #{entity.departmentId})

insert into t_section_office(section_code, section_name, section_alphbet, order_num, contact, contact_mobile, check_type, del_flag, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, delete_id, delete_time, department_id) values
(#{entity.sectionCode}, #{entity.sectionName}, #{entity.sectionAlphbet}, #{entity.orderNum}, #{entity.contact}, #{entity.contactMobile}, #{entity.checkType}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.createId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateId}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.deleteId}, #{entity.deleteTime}, #{entity.departmentId})
on duplicate key update section_code = values(section_code), section_name = values(section_name), section_alphbet = values(section_alphbet), order_num = values(order_num), contact = values(contact), contact_mobile = values(contact_mobile), check_type = values(check_type), del_flag = values(del_flag), create_id = values(create_id), create_time = values(create_time), update_id = values(update_id), update_time = values(update_time), delete_id = values(delete_id), delete_time = values(delete_time), department_id = values(department_id)
mapper.update:
update t_section_office
section_code = #{sectionCode},
section_name = #{sectionName},
section_alphbet = #{sectionAlphbet},
order_num = #{orderNum},
contact = #{contact},
contact_mobile = #{contactMobile},
check_type = #{checkType},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
create_id = #{createId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_id = #{updateId},
update_time = #{updateTime},
delete_id = #{deleteId},
delete_time = #{deleteTime},
department_id = #{departmentId},
where id = #{id}
